MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL54  postcode area of Caernarfon, affecting properties in Glan Rhonwy, Nantlle Terrace and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified an overhead line fault near Nantlle Village substation and we now expect your supply to be restored by 4:30am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:26am on 19th December
